column4: I want to do a clean install of Ubuntu 7.04, currently on 6.10. What should I backup before I go ahead? Evolution E-mails, Firefox Bookmarks, Documents...what else?
if I want to do a clean install of Ubuntu 7.04, currently on 6.10. What should I backup before I go ahead? Evolution E-mails, Firefox Bookmarks, Documents...what else?
if you want to keep everything, just your /home diectory.
